resolved.description: Vercel preview deployments failing with monorepo
resolved.solution: Use PR workflow instead of dedicated branch. PRs to master auto-generate previews using production config.
learnings: workspace:* dependencies don't work when Root Directory is a subdirectory
Framework=Other doesn't know how to serve Next.js output

resolved.description: Cannot update component while rendering another component
resolved.solution: Separate timer countdown from session end logic into two useEffects
learnings: Never call functions that update other components inside setState callbacks
Use separate useEffect to react to state changes
